items.title: 6 Killer Behavioral Economics Principles for Business
items.headline: Learn how to apply psychology to your business to work WITH the biases of your customers to get quick, low cost results.
objectives_summary: How to apply tested behavioural economics (neuromarketing) techniques to boost your business and customer outcomes - quickly and at low cost.
Understand the psychology of consumer behaviour and how to influence it in the context of Marketing Techniques (pricing, product, promotion and distribution)
Gain solid knowledge about prospect theory, social proof, defaults and decoys, the endowment effect and choice overload.
